mapper.select: select w.w_no, w.w_day, g.g_no, g.g_name, w.w_qy, w.w_result, w.w_memo, w.w_note, w.w_del from warehousing w left join goods g on w.g_no = g.g_no where w.w_del=1 order by w.w_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO warehousing(g_no, w_day, w_qy, w_result, w_memo, w_note) VALUES(#{gNo.gNo}, #{wDay}, #{wQy}, #{wResult}, #{wMemo}, #{wNote});
mapper.update: UPDATE warehousing SET w_del=0 WHERE w_no=#{wNo}
